drupalNodeEvent.title: Taiwan on the Front Line: The Changing Geostrategic Environment around the Taiwan Strait

field_speakers.processed:
Ambassador Chas W. Freeman, Visiting Scholar, Watson Institute, Brown University

Dr. Lyle Goldstein, Director of Asia Engagement, Defense Priorities

Discussant: Professor Joseph Fewsmith, Professor of International Relations Boston University

Moderator: Dr. Grant Rhode, Center for the Study of Asia, Boston University

field_organizers.processed: Organized by the Boston University Pardee School of Global Studies, Center for the Study of Asia, with support from TECO Boston and the Ministry of Education, Taiwan.

field_description.processed:
Taiwan on the Front Line: The Changing Geostrategic Environment around the Taiwan Strait will be discussed by speakers Ambassador Chas Freeman and Dr. Lyle Goldstein this Wednesday, March 30 at 4 pm.  Registration link to attend this Zoom Webinar session is on the website.

On the geostrategic front, parallels between Taiwan and Ukraine are being heavily debated across the world right now. Hope you will join us on 3/30 at this timely event.
